original_text: A person who is on the roof of his house must not go down into his house. He must not stop to get anything from his home to take with him.
korean_text: 지붕 위에 있는 자는 집 안에 있는 물건을 가지러 내려 가지 말며

sentences.original_text: A person who is on the roof of his house
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 집 지붕 위에 있는 사람은

sentences.original_text: must not go down into his house
to get anything from his home
